ai-tha-ap241:1.2_0: who did not see the most excellent of men.
ai-tha-ap241:1.3_0: I was born in a leg,
ai-tha-ap241:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap241:2.4_0: this is the fruit of removing.
ai-tha-ap241:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap241:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Janavasabha.
ai-tha-ap241:5.1_0: nine senior monks who lead the senior.
